layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x106
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x106
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x90
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 784x90 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 782x88
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 782x84
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 388x84 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 384x79
                text run at (2,2) width 212: "This cell text should be justified "
                text run at (214,2) width 172: "which means that the right"
                text run at (2,22) width 247: "and left margins should line up, no "
                text run at (248,22) width 138: "matter how long the"
                text run at (2,42) width 294: "content becomes (except the last line which "
                text run at (296,42) width 90: "should be left"
                text run at (2,62) width 51: "aligned)"
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (392,32) size 388x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 224x19
                text run at (2,2) width 224: "This cell text should be left justified"
